Look for someone else.
114.content:
Why not follow Ray (16) and his little brother Mike (10)? Ray is a meek and mild teenager, just barely a year into high school. He doesn't really fit in with anyone, not to mention he's completely useless at sports, and prefers to sit by himself and be left alone. He stands an unassuming five foot five, a bit small for his age, and is skinny as a rail. He tried to work out at one point to put a little muscle on but no matter how much he eats or how much he works out, he stays as small and skinny as ever, leading him to pursue more academic related activities. He has longish shaggy brown hair that tends to hide his face when he's leaning his head down and bright green eyes.

His little brother, on the other hand, is the complete opposite! Outgoing and extremely popular, he has a ton of friends and excels in any sport he tries. The only reason he isn't an integral part of any team he chooses is because he gets bored with spending too much time doing one thing. All of the time spent playing sports has given him a powerful build for such a young kid, lightly defined muscles visible all over his body. Standing at an impressive (for his age) five feet two inches tall, he cuts an impressive figure amongst his smaller, weaker friends, making him a natural leader. He loves to keep his short, black hair gelled up into spikes, various cuts, bruises, and bandages alternately appearing on his body thanks to his rough and tumble lifestyle.

The relationship between the two is amicable, with Mike actually adoring his older brother while Ray slightly resents his younger brother. Being older and yet so much weaker and less effectual takes its toll on Ray's esteem while Mike only sees his wonderful big bro that he wants to spend all his time with. Unfortunately for Ray, Mike is often very insistent and loves to play wrestle with him, pinning him, easily picking him up, comparing himself to him, and calling him nicknames like "squirt" or "little bro" or "tiny" and the like. He does this all with love, eager to protect his older brother, without knowing how much it gets to Ray.

One day, Ray finishes a project he had been working on for years, something to help boost himself, to give him more size and more confidence. Unfortunately for him, this little project ends up in Mike's hands, leading to problems MUCH bigger than Ray could have ever foreseen...

(It's a really long intro, I know, I kind of got carried away.)
114.title: Ray and Mike-Complete Opposites

choices: A drink that will stimulate his pituitary gland into secreting growth hormone
A machine that can change the size of any object, animate or inanimate
A pill that will change his metabolism, giving big gains in size from eating
1141.content:
"Why me?"

It was a phrase that Ray seemed to use a lot in his life. Ever since he was little (and even as he got older he pretty much REMAINED little) bad things just always seemed to happen to him. He didn't grow much, he was terrible at sports, he was shy and awkward around people his own age, and nothing he ever tried seemed to improve his life. He had taken to keeping to himself, head almost always hanging, staring at the ground, only able to see the feet of people as they walked around him. On particularly dark days he sometimes imagined that it would be better if ended up UNDER someone's foot. Maybe that's where he actually belonged. But those days were few and far between. Usually Ray would just be frustrated and annoyed. It seemed that life had picked out a particularly depressing destiny for him...especially when considered next to his little brother.

Mike was Ray's opposite in almost every way. Cheerful and loud where Ray was quiet and withdrawn, tall and strong (for his age) while Ray was short and weak (also for his age), talented at every sport he tried while Ray habitually failed, able to eat like an elephant and only put on the right kind of weight, his metabolism burning away any excess fat, while Ray couldn't gain a pound of anything, muscle, fat, or otherwise. It was like Mike was a sponge, sucking away anything and everything that Ray might have otherwise had, leaving him with only the negative aspects. This was completely ridiculous of course but Ray couldn't help but feel that way sometimes. It didn't help that Mike liked to wake Ray up by pouncing on him, pinning him down to the bed with an infectious grin on his face, eager to start the day. Living in a small family, with parents that were almost always working, made for small living arrangements. Ray and Mike had shared a room as long as Mike had been alive. Ray knew the only way he was going to get his own room was when he moved out for college in a few years. This idea was one of the few things that could bring Mike down, but Ray couldn't wait. He loved his little brother more than anyone but he couldn't help but feel a bit resentful towards him, a feeling that he hoped would disappear once they spent some time apart.

For now though, they were stuck together. The morning sun rose bright and rosy as Ray snored lightly in his bed, his thin body covered by a large comforter. He always seemed to get cold at night, even when the weather was extremely warm. His peaceful dreams were interrupted as a large, heavy weight slammed down on top of him. His eyes flew open, immediately seeing the grinning face of his younger brother staring down at him. "Wake up Ray! It's Saturday!"

Ray groaned and tried to push Mike off, his arms unable to move under the comforter. Mike had him easily pinned down, his strong arms making sure to keep Ray's at his side. "I know Mikey...that's why I'm trying to sleep in."

"Sleep in?! Are you crazy?! Today's the start of spring break, remember? We have the whole week to ourselves, just us! No friends, no mom and dad, no one else!" Mike practically shouted, jumping up, his knees still clamped around Ray's waist. Now that he was sitting up, Ray was able to sit up himself, stretching slightly, letting out a loud yawn. He had completely forgotten. Their parents had decided to take a vacation, a kind of second honey moon, during this year's spring break. They had left early yesterday morning, right after seeing the kids off to school for their last day. It wouldn't be so bad, being alone with Mike for the whole week but taking care of him was going to be a handful. Just another thing to add on top of the already heavy burden of Ray's daily routine.

Mike jumped up off the bed and landed on the ground, sticking his bare feet out, his toes clenching and relaxing slightly, an expectant look on his face. Ray groaned and said, "Not today Mikey, it's the weekend..."

"Come ooooooon, you promised you'd do this with me at least once a week!" Mike said, pouting a little. "I wanna see if I'm growing!"

"You're only ten years old." Ray said, flipping his covers aside, his own bare feet hitting the floor, just barely. "Of course you're growing. You're probably going to keep growing until you're in your twenties. That's how things work."

Mike giggled and said, "Yeah, but you said it yourself before, I'm growing really fast for my age! It's so cool! I'm almost as tall as you now!"

Ray winced as he heard this proclamation. While true, it still stung....the fact that he wasn't getting any taller while his younger brother sprouted up like a weed. No doubt he would be left behind by the time Mike hit puberty and then the problem would only get worse! Ray got up and started walking to the door. He made it about halfway before he felt a strong hand grab the back of his shirt. "Nuh-uh! You're not getting out of it THIS time!" Mike said, his other hand grabbing Ray's butt, lifting the older male clear off the ground!

"M-Mikey! Put me down! I mean it!" Ray sputtered, struggling.

Mike set Ray firmly down on the ground and spread his legs for him, making sure they were just the right mount apart before taking up his own position in the same manner. He grinned and said, "Okay, let's measure!"

Ray thought about protesting, about getting up and leaving again, but it was useless. When Mike wanted something done, he did whatever it took to get it done. It would be over faster if he just went along with it. He watched in slight trepidation as Mike slowly, almost theatrically, extended his legs, bringing their feet closer together. He licked his lips, eyes wide, his soft soles pressing up against Ray's more narrow ones. "Woooooah~! Look, look! They're almost as big as yours little guy! I really am growing!"

He immediately leaped to his feet, jumping up and down and cheering, the white shirt he wore to bed rising up slightly with every jump, giving Ray a jealous glimpse at the developing abs hidden there. Just looking at Mike you could tell he was freakishly strong for his age, his arms containing more than just a hint of biceps while his shirts were always stretched slightly over his chest. Mike had at least some idea of the stir his body caused, the admiring glances it brought around, as he always wore shirts that were JUST a bit too small and tried to dress in shorts as much as possible, his strong legs jutting powerfully out from them. Ray got slowly to his own feet, clapping Mike on the shoulder before saying, "Just get dressed and come down to breakfast, okay?"

"Okay." He said sweetly, settling down a little, his little chest heaving proudly. "You said guys with big feet tend to get really tall right little bro?"

"Don't call me that. But yes, that's usually the case." Ray said, rubbing the back of his head as he made his way to the bedroom door.

"Then I'm gonna be a GIANT!" Mike said proudly, stomping his feet a little, making the room quiver. Ray sighed as he heard this proclamation. It was true, Mike had rather large feet for his age. Finding shoes was always a problem, prompting him to mostly wear sandals fore ease, though his toes always seemed to hang over the edge of them. If he kept up at the pace he was growing, he could very well crest a full seven feet tall, if not more! Ray quickly left the room, heading for the basement.

"I'm not going to be left behind." He thought to himself firmly, opening the door and practically running down the stairs. Whereas Mike had an affinity for sports, Ray had an affinity for academics. He had been working feverishly on a secret project for years now, combining gene study with human development study and even dabbling in more obscure sciences that weren't exactly widely practiced in the general community. He did this all for the sake of stimulating his own development, to give himself at least SOMETHING in the way of a normal body and normal strength, so that he wouldn't have to constantly be at the mercy of the world, especially his younger brother. Finally, the project as in its final stages. With a few more tweaks, he'd be able to test it out. He wiped the sweat from his forehead as he finished, looking with pride at his creation.
1141.title: Why Me?

choices: The next morning, Mike has already started to noticeably grow!
Mike's growth is more gradual, while Ray tries to work on another stimulant.
11411.content:
The bright green liquid in the small glass almost glowed in the light of Ray's desk lamp as he looked at it, a smile forming on his face. "This is it," he whispered to himself. "This is what I've been working for, what will end up changing my life!" He licked his lips, thinking about the changes his body would go through once he finally drank this stimulant and his pituitary gland would finally kick in. At minimum, he should end up at over six and a half feet within a few months, though some of the projections he had worked out indicated he could end up as tall as eight and a half! He would no longer have to be left behind by his younger brother, and could finally stand up for himself.

He just had to do one final step, though this is the one that made him the most nervous. The stimulant consisted of several active ingredients, enzymes that would cause his pituitary gland to go through what basically amounted to a second puberty. But at their current state, these enzymes would be too active. They could end up overworking his hormonal system and either cause him to grow much bigger than he was aiming for, or, even worse, give him a heart attack or cause some of his organs to shut down. This meant that before he could safely drink it, the mixture needed to be chilled at below-freezing temperatures for twenty-four hours, causing the enzymes to be reduced to a near-dormant, though still effective, state.

Of course, the only place that he could think of to do this was the kitchen freezer, which presented the obvious problem of his drink being found by someone else. As long as he did it this week, his parents wouldn't be a factor, but if Mike were to find it... He shuddered, wondering if it was even worth the risk of that happening. The thought of finally being big for a change was too good to pass up, though, and so as Ray watched cartoons in the basement and ate his cereal, Mike quietly walked to the kitchen, opening the freezer door. Standing on his tiptoes, he reached up and placed the glass with the stimulant at the very back corner, as out of sight as possible. He also rearranged a stack of frozen pizzas to hide the glass from view. Taking a quick breath, he stepped back and closed the freezer door -- just in time to hear Mike bounding up the stairs.

"Hey!" Mike called out, running to the sink and tossing his now-empty bowl in it, then turning on the faucet to start rinsing it out. "So what are we going to do today?"

"I don't know, Mike," Ray said, hoping his nervousness at almost getting caught with the stimulant wasn't obvious. "I think we should just lay low and stay h--" He stopped, realizing that the best way for Mike to not find the stimulant would be to not be anywhere near the stimulant for as long as possible. If he could keep him out of the house all day, that would minimize the chances of him looking in the freezer and discovering it.

"Actually," he said slowly, "since it's Saturday, and supposed to be nice out I think, let's go to... uh...

"The park?" Mike suggested, nearly jumping up and down with excitement.

Hesitating only a moment, Ray finally nodded in agreement. "Sure. The park."

"Yaaay!" Mike cheered. "I'll go grab the football!"

As his younger brother ran up the stairs, taking them two at a time, Ray rolled his eyes and shook his head. Today was starting to sound like a lot of work all of the sudden, but "no pain, no gain," he supposed.

---

"Shower time!"

At eight o' clock that evening, Ray and Mike had finally returned home. While Mike ran back up to the bathroom they shared, still full of energy, Ray collapsed on the couch, groaning. From upstairs, he heard the shower start running, and Mike singing an indiscernible song.

Today had been exhausting. Not only had they played football and whatever else Mike could think of at the park for nearly three hours, but then they grabbed lunch, gone to see a movie (the latest comic book superhero movie that Mike was itching to see), driven an hour across town to go to the "good" mall and spent nearly four hours there. Ray had felt a little uneasy about being seen all day with his kid brother, but at least he hadn't run into anyone he knew from school. Not like that would make his reputation any worse.

Of course, it would all be worth it once the twenty-four hours had passed and he could finally drink the stimulant. Forcing himself to stand back up, he went over to the kitchen, opening the freezer and checking on the glass at the back. It looked very much like it had that morning, the green glow only fading slightly, though the glass had frosted a little on the outside. Gently shaking the glass, he was pleased to see that the stimulant still was in liquid form, sloshing from side to side. The freezing point of the stimulant was well below 0 F, so he doubted a simple kitchen freezer would affect that, but he wanted to make sure. After all, he would need to be able to drink this within a few minutes of taking it out of the fridge tomorrow morning.

Ray's anticipation began to build as he thought about what would happen once he started growing again, but he tried to keep himself in check, and slid the glass back towards the rear of the freezer, closing the door. The water seemed to suddenly stop upstairs, and he heard Mike slide the shower curtain open and step out. Feeling a little sticky himself, Ray decided to head upstairs and hop in the shower right after him.

As he stepped into the bedroom and grabbed a pair of underwear and socks from the dresser, Mike came in through the door just a minute later, wearing only a towel wrapped around his waist. As Ray turned around and saw his brother's smooth, slick body, just a little too muscular for a ten-year-old boy, he felt his blood begin to boil with jealousy. Jealousy and-- something else? He didn't know quite what it was, but seeing Mike this undressed had always given him an odd feeling, one that wasn't entirely unpleasant...

"Like what ya see, little bro?" Mike giggled, stretching his arms above his head, causing his stomach and chest muscles to go taught and flex.

Realizing that he was staring, Ray snapped out of it, saying nothing as he stepped past his brother to the bathroom. He tried to hide his scowl, but he knew that his brother had to be able to tell that he was upset, if not from his expression than from the clenching of his fists. Regardless, it wasn't going to matter after much longer, and for now, the shower would do him some good.

Fifteen minutes later, Ray felt fresher than he had at any point throughout the day. His hair was still damp as he slipped on a small black undershirt and his boxers and looked at himself in the mirror. Just stepping out of the shower was one of the few times where Ray felt good about the way that he looked, with his mussed-up hair and soft, smooth skin. He wondered if, once he was bigger, this was the kind of way he'd feel about himself all of the time.

He quickly realized that he was feeling a little dry at the back of his throat, and started heading downstairs to the kitchen to grab a glass of water, or perhaps a Gatorade. As he rounded the corner, though, he suddenly froze in his tracks, and his jaw dropped open at what he saw.

Mike was holding the small frosted glass, now empty, in his hand, and a faint trail of green liquid was visible on his lips.

"Wha-- Ho--" Ray sputtered, devastated by what he was seeing in front of him. His dreams, his desires, everything he had worked so hard for was now gone. Worse, actually; it had backfired! Not only was he going to stay the same size, but his younger brother, the one he had been so jealous of his size for so long now, was about to grow even bigger!

Looking over at Ray, Mike grinned sheepishly. "Oh... was this yours? I'm sorry!" He placed the glass on the kitchen counter behind him. "I just was crazy thirsty all of the sudden, and wanted something cold. I saw that in the freezer and it looked tasty, so I ... well, I drank it." Blushing, Mike ran his hand through his hair. "If ya want, I can try to get you another one..."

Tears welling up in his eyes, Ray spun around and ran upstairs back to his bedroom, throwing himself on his bed. He started to cry into his pillow, pounding his fist on the mattress in frustration. Why did his stupid younger brother have to go and do that? Why was Mike going to get the benefit when he already had so much? And why did he have to be so stupid and store the stimulant here at home where Mike could find it?

Ray sobbed for several minutes, until his fatigue set in and he suddenly started feeling extremely tired. Within minutes, he was starting to fall asleep, his face still moist with tears of anguish. As he did so, one final question came to mind: Just how big is Mike going to get now?

114111.content:
Ray was so exhausted from the day's events he didn't so much as flinch when there came a knock on his door. Mike was no fool and had seen the hurt in his brother's eyes as he turned and ran upstairs, getting away from him. He had stood there, a dismayed expression on his face for a moment, his heart beating fast, before he ran up the stairs after him, knocking softly on the door.

"Ray?" He said quietly, not even using any of the usual pet names he had for his older brother. "Are you okay in there?"

When he got no answer, he knocked again, a little louder, scared of hearing Ray's angry voice shouting at him. When there was still no sound from within, he gently opened the door, peeking inside. The room was dark, the shades already drawn, blocking out the last light of the evening. Mike hesitated and then walked into the room, over to his brother's bedside. "Ray?" He said again, his voice sounding unnaturally loud in the pure silence of the room. This time, Mike received an answer in the form of a soft snore, his brother's tear streaked face finally peaceful in his dreamless sleep. Mike smiled a little sadly and gently rubbed his brother's arm. "Sleep tight little bro." He said, kissing his brother on the cheek before leaving the room. He only stayed up for an hour or so longer, eating some leftovers that were in the fridge that were easy to heat up. By the time it was fully dark outside, he was in his pajamas and in bed, snoring within minutes.

The next morning Ray woke up first, his head feeling a little groggy, his stomach growling fiercely from having missed eating dinner last night. He groaned slightly, touching a hand to his gut before looking over at his brother's bed. Mike was still fast asleep, body sprawled out on top of his bed, covers kicked everywhere. His mouth was wide open as he snored, his short black hair mussed up. Ray noticed that his pajamas had gotten tangled up as well as he slept, the shirt riding halfway up his torso, revealing his abs once again, that feeling from last night briefly flaring up inside Ray. It was hard to be jealous and angry at his brother while he looked so peaceful. With the clarity of a new morning, Ray realized that he had something else he needed to worry about for now. Mike had drunk the stimulant before it had time to fully stabilize, meaning that the stimulant's effects were going to be greatly amplified. He had to make absolutely sure his brother wasn't going to have any medical problems. He would worry about the other effects later...

He quickly got dressed and headed downstairs, pulling some eggs out of the fridge along with a package of sausages and some orange juice. After turning the stove top on and dropping some butter into a frying pan, he pulled the toaster out of the appliance garage (the little area underneath the hanging cupboards that held all their smaller appliances) and deposited two pieces of bread in the first two slots. He had just finished pouring himself a glass of orange juice when he heard the butter beginning to sizzle in the pan. With a few quick motions, the butter was spread all over the frying pan, coating it completely. Ray cracked two eggs immediately into the butter, letting them fry while he pulled out another pan to cook the sausages in. It was the picture of a perfect, serene morning, the morning light shining in through the kitchen window, marred only by Ray's expression of guilt, worry, residual anger and jealousy...and just a touch of the fear of the unknown.

He was brought out of these thoughts by the sound of energetic footsteps on the stairs, Mike appearing with a grin on his face, not yet dressed. "Morning little guy!" He said brightly, back to his old rambunctious self this morning. "How'd you sleep?"

Ray sighed, not even looking at his brother, and said, "Fine Mike. How did you sleep?"

"Great!" was the cheerful reply, the sound of footsteps approaching Ray. "I'm REALLY hungry though! Can you make me some breakfast too? Please?"

There was a strange tinge of...excitement to Mike's voice as he asked this question, as though he was planning some kind of surprise. With a feeling of trepidation, Ray turned around, finding himself face to grinning face with his "little" brother! Ray's mouth dropped open again in pure shock, Mike's already wide grin getting even wider, an excited twinkle in his eye. "I knew it! Look little bro! We're the same height! That's so cool!"

Before Ray could say anything, he felt Mike's strong arms wrap around his waist, lifting him up into the air even more easily than he normally did, his younger brother laughing all the while. "Wow, you feel so LIGHT! I can't believe it! Am I finally getting a growth spurt?"

"M-Mike!" Ray shouted, finally finding his voice. "Put me down! Now!"

"Nuh uh! Not until you say "please"." He said with a cheeky grin, looking up at his brother, his arms tightening.

"I'm not going to--"

"Say please!"

"Rrgh!"

"Say it!"

"FINE! PLEASE put me down!" Ray barked out.

Mike giggled and let his brother drop to the floor. "See that wasn't so hard."

Ray steadied himself against the stove, nearly upsetting the eggs and sausages before pressing a hand against Mike's chest, pushing him away. "Look just....sit down. I'll explain everything after breakfast."

"Ooooh, so you DO know something about this!" Mike said, looking at his brother in slight awe. "Okay! I'm going to get dressed and stuff then!"

With that, he scampered away, Ray taking in how small his pajamas were. It wasn't just that the shirt had been hiked up, it actually only covered his brother's chest, his already athletic arms looking even bigger stuffed into sleeves that were too tight. The hems of the pants were wrapped tight around his calves as well. Ray shook his head, his heart beating wildly again. After only one night...Mike had already grown five inches taller! This was blowing the projections he had originally made out of the water! The fact that Mike was younger, already naturally gifted, AND hadn't even experienced puberty for himself yet was all obviously playing a part in this immense growth. Ray tried to run some calculations in his head but the numbers just kept coming out too....BIG! There was no way that Mike would possibly end up THAT huge...was there?

His thoughts were interrupted by Mike's reappearance, dressed in oddly familiar clothes..."Hey! Are you wearing my clothes?" Ray asked, giving his brother a stern look.

"Sorry small fry but I can't FIT into any of my other clothes!" Mike said, shrugging, heading into the bathroom. "Maybe by tomorrow even this stuff will be too small!"

As nervous as Ray was, Mike was equally excited. It was only a few minutes longer before breakfast was ready and Mike ran out of the bathroom, his hair gelled up into spikes once more. He sat down eagerly at the table and picked up his silverware, practically bouncing as Ray gave him his portion. Soon, both brothers were eating, Mike moving a mile a minute while Ray moved more slowly, savoring it. By the time Ray was only a quarter through with his plate, Mike was letting out a loud belch, holding his plate up. "More please!" He immediately said.

Ray stopped with a bit of sausage halfway up to his mouth and said, "Let me finish mine first."

Mike sighed theatrically, letting his plate down, his belly audibly rumbling. He impatiently watched as Ray finished about half the plate before saying, "But you're taking FOREVER! Pleeeeease just get me a little more?"

Mike was forbidden by their parents to use the stove on his own. He wasn't a dumb or clumsy kid but his boundless energy always seemed to end with him getting burned or food getting dropped to the floor. Thus it was Ray's perpetual mission to tend to the cooking. The only upside of this was that it had allowed him to gain some culinary skills he otherwise wouldn't have had. He let his fork and knife fall to the plate with a clatter, snatching Mike's plate and filling it up with the rest of the food on the stove, thrusting it back at Mike in annoyance.

"Thanks little bro!"

"How many times do I have to tell you not to call me that?"

"Well...by tomorrow it might be actually TRUE!" Mike replied with a grin, shoveling more food into his mouth.

The thought chilled Ray, imagining having to look UP at his younger brother. He was already manhandled like a toy sometimes by his brother, what would their dynamic be like when Mike inevitably grew? Ray pushed his plate aside, no longer feeling hungry, Mike eagerly taking the leftovers and adding them to his own. Once he was finished, Ray took both plates, rinsing them off before sticking them into the dishwasher. "Alright Mike! I'm ready to tell you all about what's going on. But first, you have to have a little physical."

Mike groaned and said, "I HATE physicals!"

"I know, but it's the only way to make sure you're still healthy." Ray said, slapping him lightly on the back. "Come on, get up. Into the basement."

Ray was by no means a doctor, but he knew enough about the human body to at least be able to tell that Mike's body wasn't going to suffer organ failure or have a heart attack. If that was truly in the future, the symptoms would start showing almost immediately. Ray started by taking Mike's blood pressure. As he wrapped the velcro around Mike's arm, his brother flexed it, causing it to push apart slightly. "Stop that." Ray said as he shot Mike a glare.

"Just having a little fun with this." Mike said.

Ray kept his stern gaze on Mike for a second longer before breaking off and continuing the task at hand. It was bad enough that Mike got the formula, but now his brother was rubbing it in. He was sorely tempted to call off the whole thing and let whatever bad things happen to him...but Ray wasn't that heartless, and Mike was still his little brother, despite what Mike said.

Ray took Mike's blood pressure and heart rate and found them both normal, which was a good sign. Taking out a stethoscope, he pressed it against Mike's chest to hear his heart. Mike gasped and his sizeable chest pushed back.

"Hey!" Ray snapped.

"Sorry, that thing is cold!" Mike said, fidgeting in his seat and rubbing the spot the stethoscope touched. "This is why I hate physicals, everything is so cold and...and technical! I don't get anything you're doing as you poke me with all sorts of stuff."

"I'm checking your heart to see if it's healthy or not." He said, rubbing the end of the stethoscope with his shirt to warm it up a bit. "Now hold still while I listen to it."

"Ok, just hurry up will you?" Mike rubbed his arms trying to warm himself up. "I'd probably die from pneumonia before you figure out I'm perfectly healthy."

"Don't tempt me." Ray said and pressed the stethoscope on Mike's chest again. He heard Mike's heart beat loud and clear, with no sign of strain to it whatsoever.

From there Ray performed other tests on Mike. His brother's heart and lungs were working fine, and there was no sign of any abnormalities. When Ray asked for a blood sample, though, Mike backed off.

"Whoa whoa, you didn't say anything about needles!" Mike said.

"Oh don't be such a baby, I'm just going to take a few drops." He said.

"I don't care, I did NOT agree to getting stabbed!" Mike took another step back.

Ray considered his options on how to deal with this. He could try and force Mike back, but that never really worked in the past considering that Mike always overpowered him. He could try threatening him, but he had nothing to threaten him with. Bribing was also out the window for the same reason. But, perhaps if he manipulated...

"Ok, fine, I guess I found something wrong with you after all." Ray said.

"What? What is it?" Mike asked, a tone of panic hinted in his voice.

"Apparently the bigger you are, the more chicken you become." Ray told him.

Immediately Mike's face turned red. "You...you're just making fun of me!"

"It's true, it's called a reversal of emotional size syndrome. The bigger you become, the more afraid you are of stuff, like say a tiny needle like this." He held it up. "After all, would a big, strong guy really be afraid of something as small as getting his blood drawn? No, because normally they're a lot tougher than that, and you're just a bag of marshmallows."

"Oh, I'll show you!" Mike walked up to Ray and thrust his arm out. "Go ahead and take your damn blood!"

Ray smiled and took the blood sample. Mike flinched very slightly when the needle pierced his skin and had his eyes shut the entire time, despite his show of trying to be brave. It wasn't until Ray put a bandaid on him that Mike finally relaxed.

"Ok, we're done, you can put your shirt back on." Ray told him.

"Finally!" Mike said, grabbing Ray's old shirt and pulling it onto himself. Ray noticed how much tighter it was on Mike than it ever did on himself, but pushed his irritation to the back of his mind. From what he had gathered so far, Mike was indeed perfectly healthy. He'd have to analyze the blood sample later to be sure, but for now it looked like Mike wasn't in any immediate danger. For now he'll just calculate Mike's rate of growth to see how big Mike would get. If Mike grew several inches in just one night, just how big would Mike become?

Ray began to crunch numbers, calculating Mike's rate of growth. If Mike's growth continued at the same rate of five inches a day, then in one week he'd be almost three feet taller! But that wasn't including the fact that Mike was going to enter puberty, nor the fact that his stimulant had not completely stabilized. Those factors Ray would have to wait and see before he could get a more accurate measure. But, if Mike was to grow continuously at 5 inches a day, 3 feet a week, then within a year he would be 160 feet tall! Ray gulped at the thought of a 160 foot tall brother. He already felt small among the seniors at high school, but he'd be downright microscopic compared to Mike!

"Well?" Mike asked from his seat next to Ray. "Have you figured out something yet?"

Ray looked over at Mike, who was peering at the numbers he had scribbled down. The look in his eyes told Ray that Mike didn't understand at all what the numbers meant, which was probably a good thing. Ray didn't want to let him know just how big he was going to get at the moment, Mike's ego was big enough as it is.

"There are too many unpredictable variables for me to make an accurate estimate right now." Ray said. Well, technically he didn't lie, but he didn't tell him the whole truth either.

"So are you going to tell me why I'm suddenly as tall as you are, or am I going to have to wrestle it out of you?" Mike asked.

Ray looked at Mike silently, then sighed. "I might as well tell you...That drink you took from the freezer was actually a stimulant for the pituitary gland, which would-"

"In English please?" Mike cut him off and rolled his eyes.

"Fine. It's formula I spent a lot of time on meant to make you grow bigger." Ray summed it all up in one sentence.

"You actually made something like that? That's awesome!" Mike said.

"Yes, until you drank it." Ray said.

"Yea, but...oh." Realization dawned on Mike's face. "Oh, so you wanted...and that's why...oh..."

"Yes, that's why I was so upset with you when you drank it." Ray said. "And it wasn't completely stabilized when you took it, so who knows how big you'll grow?"

"Well, as sorry as I am that I took it from you, I gotta say it sounds pretty awesome!" Mike said, excitement growing on his face. "I mean, now I get to be the biggest guy in school! Just wait until they get a load of me when I tower above them all! I'd probably be able to take on the entire football team by myself!"

Ray felt annoyed that his brother wasn't showing any remorse for stealing his precious formula from him, but there wasn't anything either of them could do. For now, he'd just have to observe Mike and see what comes out of it.

The next few days didn't make Ray feel any better about Mike; if anything, they made him even more worried -- and certainly more jealous. Ray even started to wish they didn't have the week off school, so he could put this ordeal out of mind, for a little while at least.

But he had to face the facts: Mike was growing, and growing fast. By the next morning, he passed six feet tall, and could no longer fit in any of Ray's clothes, having to find some of their father's old clothes that still left little to the imagination. The day after that, he had grown another seven inches, rapidly approaching seven feet tall. Clothes were quickly becoming a pipe dream for Mike, not that the ten-year-old seemed to mind; he gladly stomped around the house in nothing but a pair of formerly-baggy sweatpants that hugged his thighs so tight they looked like they would burst at any moment. Mike wanted to go out and show all his friends and everyone from school, but Ray thankfully was able to convince him to stay home, though he did venture out into the backyard a few times. Ray could only hope that the neighbors didn't catch sight of him.

What troubled Ray more than Mike being seen, though, was the fact that his younger-- he definitely couldn't use the word "little" any more-- brother's growth seemed to be accelerating. Five inches the first night, six the second, and seven the third... At that rate, his original 160 foot estimate for a year out would definitely be way under. Mike couldn't possibly get that big... could he?

And while his body (thankfully) didn't seem to be packing on any added muscle or bulk, Ray couldn't help but notice that the bulge in Mike's pants continued to get more and more pronounced, and not just because the pants were becoming smaller on his frame. Ray had caught a glimpse of Mike's package when his younger brother had been readjusting his pants, and it was clear that Mike's endowment was now bigger than his own, both overall as well as in proportion to his body-- much larger than any ten-year-old had the right to have. It must've been a side effect of the formula that he hadn't been aware of.

All this lead to Ray deciding that he had to try and start developing some sort of antidote, and fast-- their parents would be back home at the end of the week, and if he didn't do anything, Mike might not fit inside the house anymore! Locking himself in his room towards the end of this third day, Ray spent several hours trying to reverse-engineer the formula and create something that could counteract its effects. But he soon started to dread that his task was impossible; even if such an antidote could be synthesized, he was trying to do several weeks worth of work in a few hours.

Still, he kept at it, long into the night. Eventually, though, he succumbed to his exhaustion, falling asleep at his desk right where he was working. He slept for several hours, only waking up when a loud noise jerked him out of his rest. His heart pounded as he got up and carefully, quietly, left the room, afraid of what the source of that noise would end up being, and knowing that Mike was almost certainly the cause...

Leaning down with what little of your body was free, you peaked down at the ground and immediately felt a new chill of fear slide up your spine.

Below Mike's towering frame was a growing assembly of military vehicles. Humvees and troop transports were filtering their way through the narrow roads criss-crossing the suburban area. At a number of the roads leading south towards the city, trucks and humvees had been parked nose to nose in order to "block" Mikey from proceeding. However, it seemed that the military had missed the memo on your brother being close to 200 feet tall.

"Do not come any further!", rang an amplified voice (clearly directed through a microphone), "Stay where you are and do not move!"

While you were concerned about your own safety (catching a stray bullet wasn't on your priorities list), you couldn't help but be concerned for your younger brother, even if he was 170 feet tall. You had no idea if he would be able to survive being shot at by the military, and you didn't even wanna think about the missiles being trained on him by the helicopter.

Craning your neck back up to look at Mikey's face, you were relieved to see a look of equal concern as he clearly understood the warning from the soldier below. "Listen to him Mikey!", you implored him, "I really don't wanna see you hurt, pleeeeaaasssee? Just stop and I'll try to help you!"

Hearing you speak however, seemed to have the opposite of the calming effect you'd been going for and Mikey's look of concern quickly vanished. With his 20/20 vision, Mike began to scan the roadblock in front of him, a look of bold defiance quickly appearing on his face. Crossing his arms Mike bellowed out, "Oh yeah! Why should I stop?"

"Because we'll...shoot you." replied the voice; the last words clearly dropping off in volume

Replying a booming laugh, Mike took a defiant step forward adding plenty of extra force to it. The step shattered the asphalt beneath his foot and managed to knock a couple soldiers off their feet as their vehicles bounced up and down on their suspensions. Mike's basketball sized toes were now barely touching the shoes of one of the soldiers and after he'd swallowed a good sized lump in his throat, you saw him take a cautious step back. Laughing at their obvious fear, Mike's ego clearly took over as he made his own ultimatum.

"LISTEN UP!", he yelled forcing you to cover your ears, "EVERY ONE OF YOU BUGS HAS TO THE COUNT OF THREE TO GET OUT OF MY WAY!"

The soldiers exchanged nervous glances before shakily raising their rifles. Giggling at their show of defiance, Mike started his count. "One!...Two!...THREE! Ready or not here I come!", he called out giggling a little at the end of his sentence.

A chorus of gunfire answered mike's challenge and lines of bullets streamed up from the ground towards Mike's enormous form.

What happened to Mike?
1141112112.title: Its the Military! And it doesn't look like ...

choices: In the parking lot of the grocery store, still trapped under Mike's waistband.
In a mysterious room sitting across from a dangerous looking man.
11411121121.content:
Yelping in fear, you closed your eyes and attempted to make yourself a smaller target as bullets began whizzing overhead. Unfortunately for you, the crushing force of the waistband prevented almost all movement and you stayed just as exposed as you had been before the shooting started. However, you noticed something was missing, where were the painful yelps from your brother, where was the crying of "OW! That hurts!" and other things of that nature. Opening your eyes you looked up to see a face of..astonishment.

Mike's arms were outstretched as he slowly rotated his arms and hands scanning every square inch of his body. Instead of being covered in hundreds of tiny bullet wounds, Mike's skin was perfectly clean despite the bullets clearly hitting him. The only thing the bullets seemed to be doing was creating the occasional harmless spark, otherwise simply hitting his body with a "Ping!" before seemingly disappearing.

Realizing the bullets were having no effect, the military changed gears and began to switch to heavier weapons. The popping of rifles began to be drowned out as the booming of heavy machine guns rang out through the neighborhood. For the military, this would be a mistake...

The booming of the machine guns was just loud enough to snap Mike out of his trance, and a look of amusement spread across his face. Spying a humvee at his feet firing its machine gun at him, he slid one his feet forward and used his massive weight to grind it into scrap metal. Spotting another humvee just down the road, Mike took a long yet lazy step towards it, carelessly crushing it beneath one of his 30 foot long treads.

As Mike made his way around the neighborhood crushing vehicle after vehicle, you couldn't help but notice how relaxed he was. Perhaps wanting to seem even scarier, Mike took each step with extreme slowness, letting each foot sit there for a fraction of a second before taking the next step. With it being quite obvious to him that the bullets were having no effect, you realized Mike had all the time in the world.

As the gunfire began die out around Mike, you saw the soldiers beginning to abandon their posts and begin to run towards a grocery store just up the road. There a number of troop carriers and armored cars were waiting in the parking lot, ready to move in with reinforcements. Spotting them Mike put on a mock face of concern cooing, "Awww, are the wittle bugs trying to run? I think they'd better be careful of the big bad giant!"

Folding his arms behind his head, Mike turned to give chase, a cocky grin spread across his face as he took long and exaggerated steps towards the store. You could only close your eyes as you heard his feet rip through the fragile houses beneath him accompanied by crunch of people beneath his massive treads. Separating the neighborhood from the store was a wide stretch of main road, and Mike stopped just at the edge of it, less than one stride now separating him from the main force of the military. Crossing his arms in front of his chest, Mike gave the military a piercing stare as he drummed his toes on the ground, the vibrations no doubt being felt by every soldier present.

"Guess its time to finish off these annoying bugs!", Mike boomed, raising a foot into the air. But just as he was about to stomp down on the military's side of the street, the "WHOOSH!" of a missile sounded out. The helicopter fired missile slammed into the Mike's shoulder blade and he wheeled around to face his attacker. Before he could take any action however, another missile slammed into the back of his head obscuring his face in a cloud of smoke. As Mike tried to wave away the smoke, the Helicopter let loose its swarm missiles directly into Mike's face, causing him to stumble backwards onto the road.

As Mike realized what was happening, missile after missile soared up from the ground below peppering his body in explosions. Rocket after rocket slammed into Mike's body and you could barely see or breath in the cloud of smoke covering Mike's entire upper body. After several minutes of non-stop missile fire, the number of rockets began to subside and the cloud of smoke began to clear around the young titan.

Finally, the smoke cleared and after expelling the last of it from you lungs with a cough, you looked up to examine Mike. Mike's cocky grin was gone and instead your younger brother looked exhausted from the pounding he'd just taken. You felt Mike's thigh shift beneath you one final time as he tried to step forward before you saw his eyes roll back in his head. Suddenly, a rush of vertigo reached your head and you saw the entire world roll backwards as Mike's enormous frame crashed to the ground. The force of the impact was mostly absorbed by Mike's body, but for a moment you blacked out.

Where were you when you woke up?
11411121121.title: The bullets have no effect! At least not in a d...

choices: Mike wants to head straight for the source and heads towards a power plant!
Mike wants to mess with the city now and he barrels towards downtown!
114111211211.content:
You let out a groan as your eyelids slid open and the sky above you came into focus. Still dazed by Mike's fall, you could barely make out the acres of skin around you as you attempted to see what was going on around you. Suddenly a pair of hands grabbed your shoulders and someone yelled behind you, "One, Two, Three!" before you felt the hands trying to unsuccessfully drag you out from underneath the crushing elastic. A pair of bodies fell down behind you with a groan as the flesh beneath them suddenly...shifted. Turning around, you saw two soldiers scan the "ground" beneath them with expressions of terror, exchanging a quick glance before fleeing in terror.

"Mikey?!", you called out nervously, "Are-are you alright?"

The wall behind you twitched for a moment before it began to ripple with the giggling of your very much alright, "little" brother. Suddenly, you felt several G's of force pushing you back into Mike's stomach as he leapt to his feet, your vision going momentarily red from the sudden acceleration. Dazed, you shook your head to try and fend off your dizziness wincing a bit as blood rushed back to your head. Looking up, you saw Mikey's beaming face along with his pointer finger barrelling straight towards you! Yelping in terror, you thrust your arms into the air as if your scrawny limbs would somehow be able to stop a finger as big as you were.

"Relax, bro!", Mike said as he suppressed a laugh. "I'm not gonna hurt you!", and he pressed the enormous digit press into your head, using his finger to rub your head a bit, tousling your hair. Removing his finger, you rubbed your head a bit trying to dull the pain as you groaned out, "I...thought you were..done?"

An audible snort escaped Mike's mouth as he scoffed at the idea of being taken out by "bugs". "Nahhhh, I just wanted to see if playing dead would lure the military in!" "Lure in the mil-", you stammered before looking down at the ground. Packed in around Mike's form were the remnants of the military, previously ready to "capture" Mike.

You no longer had words for the situation and all that you could do was gulp as you tried to decipher what Mike was trying to do here. "Is he really that sadistic, did he lure them in here just to crush all of them?...No, he would've done that before, he has no reason to play dead!" Your thoughts were interrupted as Mike stomped his foot on the ground, causing the whole army to jump.

"Well are you bugs going to try and attack me or what?", Mike boomed impatiently.

Unfortunately for Mike however, the military was done. Their ammunition was exhausted and their spirits crushed as they'd realized they hadn't even touched Mike this entire time. Instead of popping rifle fire and streams of bullets, the army answered with almost complete silence, with only a few murmurs scattered across the ocean of helmets.

Mike seemed disappointed at this turn of events and a frown spread across his face as he realized the military wouldn't be fighting him.

"Well if you guys aren't gonna fight anymore, I'll be leaving. Later everyone!", and Mike stepped forward to leave.

Naturally of course, he couldn't help but mess with his size and he made sure to plant as many steps as possible on the military below, the crunching of vehicles and the wet squishes of people accompanying him as he left.

...


Mike jogged for a good 10 minutes as he seemed to look for something in particular. You wanted to ask him what he was looking for, but every time you opened your mouth, the wind tore the words right out of your mouth and you were forced to close it. Finally, Mike yelled out an "Ah-ha!" and barrelled towards a relatively inconspicuous 10-story apartment building. Slowing down, Mike stomped into the parking lot in front of the relatively boring building and stomped both his feet into the ground, a "1-2!" thud pounding into your chest and almost certainly being felt in the building.

Cupping his hands, Mike yelled at the top of his voice, "Attention everyone! I'm going to tear down this building soon so you'd better leave!"

Waiting for just a moment, Mike crossed his arms as he waited for the residents to flee the building, tapping his foot impatiently as people ran along the sides of the building, desperate to get away from him. When the stream of people had slowed to a trickle, Mike stepped forward and grabbed the roof of the building. Pressing down tentatively, Mike's hand bent in the roof of the top floor a bit, but did nothing more. Confident that the building was strong, Mike turned around and hoisted himself up onto the top of the building. The top two floors caved in from Mike's sheer tonnage, but the building still stood by some miracle, and Mike found himself quite comfortably seated on the top of the building.

With his feet now swinging in front of the third floor windows, Mike finally plucked you out from underneath the waistband of his briefs and somewhat roughly dropped you into his palm. Grinning at you, Mike finally spoke.

"Well bro, I'd say your growth serum worked!", he boomed making you wince,"And guess what, I figured out how to grow even bigger!"

Shocked, you opened your mouth to reply only to close it again as you tried to think up the "proper" thing to say.

"We-well", you stammered out, "how do you grow then?"

"Simple!", Mikey replied, "I absorb energy to help me grow!"

Taken aback by his answer, you had no idea what to think of his claim. The serum had been to stimulate a new kind of puberty, what Mike was saying would defy the laws of physics. You didn't want to ask, but you knew you had to if you wanted to start to figure things out.

"Wait, how do you know then? You haven't gotten any bigger since we left our house."

"Weeellll, growing bigger was just an option earlier I only realized earlier that I was the one who made this pair of underwear. When I was stomping on all the houses in the neighborhood, I accidentally touched one of those power line thingys. After I stomped on all the houses I felt amazing! Like I could do anything or grow to be any size! But I was kinda embarrassed being naked so I couldn't stop thinking about at least having some underwear to put on! At first I thought I just felt so good because I was having so much fun, but I remember seeing a cable in one of my footprints as we left!"

"So you can either use the energy to grow, or to create stuff with your mind?", you said in shock.

"Yup! And I got that same feeling while the military was shooting at me! I feel like I'm gonna explode with energy!", Mike boomed with a smile. "Well bro", he grunted as he stretched his arms, "I think you'd better grab onto something, because I'm about to have a new growth spurt!"

Raising your arms you pleaded with Mike, managing to yell out, "Wait! Don't do it!", but your words fell on deaf ears.

Mike's eyes were already closed with concentration and you heard a low rumble as Mike's skin ground against the concrete of the building he was seated on. His palm stretched out in front of you becoming a field of smooth skin. His torso broadened and expanded rising slowly into the sky. Running to the edge of Mike's lengthening fingers, you looked down to see his thighs stretching outward like flesh colored runways. A "THUD!" tickled you ears as Mike's feet made contact with the ground, the appendages creating a landslide-like sound as their expansion ground anything they made contact with into dust.

Finally, after a solid minute of growing the sound of grinding concrete began to lessen until it disappeared altogether, Mike having finally exhausted the energy gained from his fight with the military. Opening his eyes, Mike wiped a bit of sweat off his brow letting out a "whew!" "Well bro, off to the next adventure!" he boomed, and before you could protest he was already on his feet.

But where was Mike's next adventure?
